segments.text: I find it funny how the woman is just standing there, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea that the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the edge and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so mischievous, and she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is standing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, looking so cute and eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so surprised when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices the water soon before it gets too messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a funny little domestic comedy.
segments.speaker: PAR
